invertiforms 0.0.0.9002
  • Reference

Title

Source: R/DoubleCenter.R
DoubleCenter.Rd

Convience constructor for DoubleCenter

DoubleCenter(A)

# S4 method for DoubleCenter,sparseMatrix
transform(iform, A)

# S4 method for DoubleCenter,sparseLRMatrix
inverse_transform(iform, A)

# S4 method for DoubleCenter,vsp_fa
inverse_transform(iform, A)

Arguments

A

TODO
iform

TODO

Value

DoubleCenter creates a DoubleCenter.

  • transform() applies the double centering operation to a matrix

Examples


library(igraph)

#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘igraph’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     decompose, spectrum
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     union
library(igraphdata)

data("karate", package = "igraphdata")

A <- get.adjacency(karate)

iform <- DoubleCenter(A)

A_tilde <- transform(iform, A)
A_tilde
